comments.text:
Created attachment 567098
ffp20111014c.png

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

Firefox 7.0.1 not maximized

Display Bookmarks Toolbar

Click Show More Bookmarks arrows


Actual results:

Results display outside of FF window, often leaving a persistent image in the FF border and Windows desktop (see attached)


Expected results:

Displaying result inside the FF window should prevent this from happening
comments.raw_text:

comments.text: Does the issue still occur if you start Firefox in Safe Mode? http://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Safe+Mode
comments.raw_text: Does the issue still occur if you start Firefox in Safe Mode? http://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Safe+Mode

comments.text:
(In reply to Tim (fmdeveloper) from comment #1)
> Does the issue still occur if you start Firefox in Safe Mode?
> http://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Safe+Mode

Just checked and in Safe Mode there is no issue.

I disabled all plugins and extensions and the issue remains.

Thoughts?

tia
comments.raw_text:
(In reply to Tim (fmdeveloper) from comment #1)
> Does the issue still occur if you start Firefox in Safe Mode?
> http://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Safe+Mode

I disabled all plugins and extensions and the issue remains.

Thoughts?

tia

comments.raw_text: may be hardware acceleration? try disabling that from advanced options and see if it is involved
comments.text: may be hardware acceleration? try disabling that from advanced options and see if it is involved

comments.text:
You nailed it Marco, that was the problem.

For the record, I am on Win 7 64, no graphics card, using Intel HD Graphics 3000.

Thx
